dct_title_s: Map to illustrate Dr. Livingstone's Route across Africa
dct_description_sm: Pubd. for the Journal of the Royal Geographical Socy. by J. Murray Albemarle Strt. London 1857 ; J. Arrowsmith.
Dr. Livingstone's route is colored red.
Shows waterways, villages, regional/tribal names (such as "Auemba or Muemba").
Descriptive text, such as "Well Wooded Country."
One region has text "Matiamvo is the Paramount Chief of Londa & of all the People called Balonda."
Journal of the Royal Geographic Society, volume 27, between pages 348-349.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
